recipesJson.name: Blueberry+butter=yummmmm
recipesJson.author: Benoz
recipesJson.description:
Who doesnt love blueberries i know i do and who dosnt love butter i know i do so combine the to and get a awesome blueberry butter.
Tried this recipe a few ways and the vanilla swirl really brings it all together. 
The meringue and butter give you a smooth mouth feel and the berries give you a sweet blue sensation
